name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Arthur CRAWFORD, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Arthur CRAWFORD, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John David Egnal, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Bonnie B. Leadbetter, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
347 A.2d 485
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Arthur CRAWFORD, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 26, 1975.
John David Egnal, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Bonnie B. Leadbetter, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
